climbs.name: Dosvedanya
climbs.fa: Don Cossel, Jim Phillips, Charlie Lieu; 2015

content.description: Bouldery entrance into double crack up past a small tree. Easier slab moves above. No bolts but great gear.
content.protection: Gear to BD #2. Doubles of #0.75 and 0.4 were useful.
content.location: Double crack system just right and barely uphill of a pine tree.

climbs.name: Auf Wiedersehen
climbs.fa: Don Cossel, Jim Phillips, Charlie Lieu; 2015

content.description: Really good movement after a balancy slab start past a few couple bolts. Take caution not to weight the hollow flake. Great movement above past a huge boulder to low angle handcrack before the chains, which are shared with Dosvedanya
content.protection: Gear to #4. Placed a crucial #0.2 as well, so small stuff also helpful.
content.location: Middle route, look for the short line of bolts just right of the scrub line for fully bolted "Adios".

climbs.name: Adios
climbs.fa: Don Cossel, Jim Phillips, Charlie Lieu; 2015

content.description: Slab moves up a series of diagonal seams and over an overlap. A couple reachy moves.
content.location: Obvious clip up following the Scrub line about half way up the hill; just downhill of two pine trees.
